page.title: 08OUR SCHOOL IN SEASCALE
page.content: Our school is quite big.It has 3 halls which are used for P.E.,eating and assembly.There are 9 class rooms not including the old wing which is used for various community work.We have 2 BBC computers,a television and a well stocked library.Also we have a well equipped Resources Room and a Maths Area.We have 2 playgrounds which are marked out for football,netball and rounders and extensive school grounds which we use for games and nature studies.We have a small pond which contains a number of frogs and small insects. The school was built in 1951 to accommodate all Windscale's worker's children.
